title: Poriyal (South Indian Chickpeas and Peppers)
ingredients: ['450g tinned chickpeas', '1 medium onion', '1 medium tomato', '2 red peppers', '2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '5 small pieces of cinnamon sticks', '1 teaspoon black mustard seeds', '2 teaspoons urad dal', '1/4 teaspoon turmeric', '250ml passata', '250ml water', '1 teaspoon curry powder', 'salt', '1-2 tablespoons desiccated coconut']
